title: Quiet Cheap Beach Accom in the South or Kerala
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Kerala » Quiet Cheap Beach Accom in the South or Kerala Quiet Cheap Beach Accom in the South or Kerala # 1 Hi Can anyone recommend me a quiet cheapish (700ish /night) place in the south ? Somewhere I can turn up pay and pass out for a couple of months without being hassled / disturbed / robbed !!! I was at Kappil beach once just north of Varkala ... massive empty beach. Any accom near there ? thanks ... frankly anywhere south north east or west ... I am tired, don't feel like I could do the trekking around hunting down a place ...
